H0.text: Which man, according to the Holy Bible, fathered Ishmael by sleeping with his wife's servant, Hagar. Abraham

H1.text: Which man, according to the Holy Bible, fathered Ishmael by sleeping with his wife's servant, Hagar. Isaac

H2.text: Which man, according to the Holy Bible, fathered Ishmael by sleeping with his wife's servant, Hagar. Jacob

H3.text: Which man, according to the Holy Bible, fathered Ishmael by sleeping with his wife's servant, Hagar. Avram

A4.text: Sarai then offered her Egyptian slave, Hagar, to Abram with the intention that she would bear him a son.

A5.text: Early the next morning, Abraham brought Hagar and Ishmael out together.
